```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)

gene_pubmed <- read_rds("../data/summary/gene_pubmed.rds")
```

# Overall gene trend

```{r}
dat.year = gene_pubmed %>%
    mutate(year = year(date)) %>%
    select(pmid, year) %>%
    group_by(year) %>%
    mutate(uniq = !duplicated(pmid)) %>%
    filter(n_distinct(pmid) > 99)

ggplot(dat.year,
       aes(x = year, fill = uniq)) +
    geom_bar() +
    theme_bw()
```

# Hottest genes

```{r}
plot_gene_trend <- function(ntop, year_ = NULL, pmid_ = NULL) {
    if (is.numeric(pmid_)) {
        dat = gene_pubmed %>%
            filter(pmid %in% pmid_)
    } else {
        dat = gene_pubmed
    }
    
    if (is.null(year_)) {
        dat = dat %>%
            mutate(year = year(date)) %>%
            group_by(gid, gname) %>%
            summarise(count = n()) %>%
            ungroup() %>%
            mutate(rank = min_rank(desc(count))) %>%
            arrange(desc(count))
    } else {
        dat = dat %>%
            mutate(year = year(date)) %>%
            group_by(gid, gname, year) %>%
            summarise(count = n()) %>%
            filter(year == year_) %>%
            ungroup() %>%
            select(-year) %>%
            mutate(rank = min_rank(desc(count)))
    }
    
    dat = dat %>% top_n(ntop, count)
    
    ggplot(dat,
           aes(x = reorder(gname, count),
           y = count,
           fill = count)) +
    geom_bar(stat = 'identity') + 
    geom_text(aes(x = gname, y = 0.5, label = rank),
        hjust = 0, vjust = 0.55, size = 4, colour = 'red') +
    labs(x = 'Gene symbol') +
    coord_flip() + 
    theme_bw()
}
```

```{r}
plot_gene_trend(20)
```

## 2015

```{r}
plot_gene_trend(20, 2015)
```

## 2016

```{r}
plot_gene_trend(20, 2016)
```

## Dendritic Cell

```{r}
dc.pmid <- as.numeric(readLines('../data/pubmed/dc.pmid'))
plot_gene_trend(20, pmid_ = dc.pmid)
```
